summary.span: 包含各種公用程式函式，提供與 Visual Basic 6.0 的回溯相容性 (Backward Compatibility)。

span.span: Contains various utility functions for backward compatibility with Visual Basic 6.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別中的函式會使用 Visual Basic 6.0 專案，在升級期間[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The functions in this class are used during the upgrade of Visual Basic 6.0 projects to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 某些函式取代，不再支援的 Visual Basic 6.0 函式[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]; 其他補償物件模型中的差異。Some functions replace Visual Basic 6.0 functions that are no longer supported in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]; others compensate for differences in the object models. 若要使用此類別中的函式[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]專案中，將參考加入`Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6`命名空間。To use functions in this class in a [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] project, add a reference to the `Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6` namespace. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Visual Basic 6.0`MouseIcon`表單或控制項的屬性無法用來載入自訂`MousePointer`（游標）。In Visual Basic 6.0, the `MouseIcon` property of a form or control could be used to load a custom `MousePointer` (cursor). 在某些情況下，針對映像`MouseIcon`儲存為`stdOle.IPicture`; 此函式可由升級工具來轉換至`stdOle.IPicture`。In some cases, the image for the `MouseIcon` was stored as a `stdOle.IPicture`; this function is used by the upgrade tool to convert a to a `stdOle.IPicture`. 要轉換中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]，使用方法類別。To convert a in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], use the method of the class. span.span: Performs a logical equivalence on two expressions.

returns.span: 如果兩個運算式相等則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the two expressions are equal; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果任一個運算式是`Null`，結果也是`Null`。If either expression is `Null`, result is also `Null`. 當兩個運算式是`Null`，結果根據下表來決定：When neither expression is `Null`, result is determined according to the following table: |如果 expression1 為If expression1 is|和 expression2 為And expression2 is|結果是The result is| |-----------------------|------------------------|-------------------| |`true`|`true`|`true`| |`true`|`false`|`false`| |`false`|`true`|`false`| |`false`|`false`|`true`| 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]、`Eqv`運算子不再是 Visual Basic 語言的一部分; 請使用等於 （=） 比較運算子，取代`Eqv`邏輯評估。In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], the `Eqv` operator is no longer a part of the Visual Basic language; use the equals (=) comparison operator in place of `Eqv` for logical evaluations. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

span.span: A that contains the result of the bitwise comparison.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Eqv`運算子中兩個數值運算式執行位元的比較相同位置的位元，並設定對應位元，根據下表：The `Eqv` operator performs a bitwise comparison of identically positioned bits in two numeric expressions and sets the corresponding bit according to the following table: |如果 expression1 位元If bit in expression1 is|並 expression2 中的位元And bit in expression2 is|結果是The result is| |------------------------------|-------------------------------|-------------------| |00|00|11| |00|11|00| |11|00|00| |11|11|11| 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]、`Eqv`運算子已不再針對位元評估使用; Visual Basic 語言的一部分`Not`和`XOr`運算子。In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], the `Eqv` operator is no longer a part of the Visual Basic language; for bitwise evaluations use the `Not` and `XOr` operators. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Visual Basic 6.0 國際版本的應用程式所建立的所有可當地語系化的資訊，例如字串，將放入不同的資源檔 (.res) 每種語言。In Visual Basic 6.0, international versions of an application were created by putting all localizable information, such as strings, into a separate resource file (.res) for each language. 在執行階段，地區設定專屬的資源已從資源檔載入藉由呼叫`LoadResString`， `LoadResPicture`，和`LoadResData`函式。At run time, locale-specific resources were loaded from the resource file by calling the `LoadResString`, `LoadResPicture`, and `LoadResData` functions. 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]，國際版本的應用程式會建立變更`Language`表單，以在設計階段屬性。In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], international versions of an application are created by changing the `Language` property of a form at design time. 選取每個地區設定，會自動建立個別的資源檔 (.resx)。A separate resource file (.resx) is automatically created for each locale selected. 您不再需要明確載入資源從程式碼。使用者的地區設定來設定資源會自動載入架構。You no longer have to explicitly load resources from code; resources are automatically loaded based on the user's locale. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[全球化 Windows Form](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/globalizing-windows-forms.md)。For more information, see [Globalizing Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/globalizing-windows-forms.md). [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

public: static System::Object ^ LoadResData(System::Object ^ ID, System::Object ^ restype, System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ Culture);

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Visual Basic 6.0`ValidateControls`方法用來強制`Validate`控制項具有焦點，當表單關閉時，如果事件`Validate`事件失敗，發生錯誤。In Visual Basic 6.0, the `ValidateControls` method was used to force the `Validate` event for the control that has focus when a form is closed; if the `Validate` event fails, an error was raised. 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]、`ValidateControls`方法取代方法，這個方法會傳回`true`或`false`。In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], the `ValidateControls` method is replaced by the method, which returns `true` or `false`. 此函式升級工具用於模擬的 Visual Basic 6.0 行為。This function is used by the upgrade tools to emulate the Visual Basic 6.0 behavior.
